Name: Radiant Cross
Description: Beam an awe inspiring divine light that purifies any monster in its path. Extends in a cone out to 7 meters in front of you, pure and simple.

Misc.ToolTip: The amount of time required to craft the Radiant Cross.
The amount of time the Radiant Cross can continuously or gradually be fired from full charge before being completely depleted.
The amount of continuous damage required by the Radiant Cross in order to wound or stun the monster.
The range of the Radiant Cross' cone.
The base size of the Radiant Cross cone (the size of the cone at its starting point). This may be incorrect!
The time it takes for the Radiant Cross cone to reach its maximum range.
The amount of time it takes for the Radiant Cross to warm up when initially trying to fire it.
The movement speed multiplier applied to teens when aiming the Radiant Cross (firing).
The minimum movement speed multiplier applied to the monster while being damaged by the Radiant Cross.
The maximum movement speed multiplier applied to the monster while being damaged by the Radiant Cross.

WeaponMods.Name: Angelic Fury
WeaponMods.Description:
+ If the monster is Wounded by the Radiant Cross, the Banished duration is increased by 20%.
- If the monster is Stunned by the Radiant Cross, the Stunned duration is decreased by 30%.

Misc.ToolTip: The penalty multiplier applied to the monster's Banished duration when Wounded by a Radiant Cross with Angelic Fury equipped.
The bonus multiplier applied to the monster's Stunned duration when Stunned by a Radiant Cross with Angelic Fury equipped.

WeaponMods.Name: Divine Light
WeaponMods.Description:
+ The Radiant Cross consumes 20% less energy when used.
- The Radiant Cross beam takes an additional 0.25 seconds to reach its maximum distance when firing.

Misc.ToolTip: The bonus multiplier applied to the Radiant Cross' energy consumption while firing with Divine Light equipped.
The added time it takes for the Radiant Cross to reach its maximum distance while Divine Light is equipped.

WeaponMods.Name: Hallowed Ground
WeaponMods.Description:
+ The maximum attack range of the Radiant Cross is increased by 20%.
- You can no longer move while using the Radiant Cross.

Misc.ToolTip: The bonus multiplier applied to the Radiant Cross' range while the user has Hallowed Ground equipped.

WeaponMods.Name: Crucifier
WeaponMods.Description:
+ The crafting time of the Radiant Cross is reduced by 10%.
- The Radiant Cross can only be crafted in a match after the monster has already been wounded by the Purify stigma.

Misc.ToolTip: The bonus multiplier applied to the Radiant Cross' crafting time while the user has Crucifier equipped.

WeaponMods.Name: Saving Grace
WeaponMods.Description: * While firing the Radiant Cross and for 0.8 seconds afterwards if you are Injured by a monster's Basic Attack any loss of Life will be prevented and the Radiant Cross will be destroyed.

Misc.ToolTip: The extended duration of the damage block effect on a Radiant Cross where the user is running Saving Grace.
